24c3f77f-a247-45d1-9550-b0916de10f9b:::||@!@||:::2025-03-31T01:55:36:::||@!@||:::{"id":"24c3f77f-a247-45d1-9550-b0916de10f9b","title":{"en":"Kyou de Anata wo Wasuremasu. Dakara Douzo o-shiawase ni"},"altTitles":[{"ja":"今日で貴方を忘れます。だからどうぞお幸せに"},{"en":"Starting today, I will forget you, so I wish you happiness."}],"availableTranslatedLanguages":["en"],"description":{"en":"“Until graduation, please allow me to love another woman.”\n\nWith these cruel words, the Crown Prince shattered the heart of his noble fiancée, who had loved him with unwavering devotion. Despite her pain, she tried to remain strong, upholding her dignity as the daughter of a ducal family and the future queen.\n\nBut the greatest shock wasn’t just his words—it was his actions. He openly flaunted his love for his mistress, betraying her before the eyes of everyone. Again and again, she endured the heartbreak in silence, until her heart was on the verge of breaking completely.\n\nYet love, even when painful, does not fade so easily… However, she had reached a point where she could bear no more.\n\nIn a moment of despair, she made her final decision—she would abandon her old self, even if it cost her life.\n\nA dramatic tale of love, betrayal, and rebirth, where what seemed like the end becomes the beginning of an entirely different fate!\n\n(Source: MangaUpdates)"},"links":{"amz":"https://www.amazon.co.jp/dp/B0DJKHF8TZ","ebj":"https://ebookjapan.yahoo.co.jp/books/857614","mu":"iaxhkwk"},"originalLanguage":"ja","publicationDemographic":"josei","contentRating":"safe","tags":[{"id":"423e2eae-a7a2-4a8b-ac03-a8351462d71d","name":{"en":"Romance"}},{"id":"b9af3a63-f058-46de-a9a0-e0c13906197a","name":{"en":"Drama"}},{"id":"cdc58593-87dd-415e-bbc0-2ec27bf404cc","name":{"en":"Fantasy"}}]}

Thanks to his efforts, the two childhood friends—always by each other's side—finally end up together. After seeing it all through, Tsubaki spends a sleepless night, choking on the urge to scream... However, he repaid her unconditional devotion with betrayal, an extramarital affair, and a gruesome death.\n\nJust before Alexandra died, she had one thought in her head: “If I could go back into the past, I would be willing to be his wife again. Then I can show him how painful it is to be betrayed by the one you loved the most!”\n\nMiraculously, Alexandra returned to the day of her wedding with her husband. She decided to become the empress once again to exact the most delightful and brutal revenge she can…\n\n- https://www.pocketcomics.com/comic/7535\n- https://www.lezhinus.com/en/comic/revenge_honey"},"links":{"ap":"a-villainess-revenge-is-sweeter-than-honey","engtl":"https://www.tappytoon.com/en/book/a-villainess-revenge-is-sweeter-than-honey","mu":"967veox","nu":"a-villainess-revenge-is-sweeter-than-honey","raw":"https://www.comico.kr/comic/7535"},"originalLanguage":"ko","contentRating":"suggestive","tags":[{"id":"292e862b-2d17-4062-90a2-0356caa4ae27","name":{"en":"Time Travel"}},{"id":"423e2eae-a7a2-4a8b-ac03-a8351462d71d","name":{"en":"Romance"}},{"id":"b9af3a63-f058-46de-a9a0-e0c13906197a","name":{"en":"Drama"}},{"id":"cdc58593-87dd-415e-bbc0-2ec27bf404cc","name":{"en":"Fantasy"}},{"id":"e197df38-d0e7-43b5-9b09-2842d0c326dd","name":{"en":"Web Comic"}},{"id":"f5ba408b-0e7a-484d-8d49-4e9125ac96de","name":{"en":"Full Color"}},{"id":"f8f62932-27da-4fe4-8ee1-6779a8c5edba","name":{"en":"Tragedy"}}]}

things?!\"\n\nWhen he was in the third year of middle school, Hizaki Shiou was summoned to another world to save it. Setelah mengalahkan Raja Iblis dan dipulangkan paksa ke masa kini, lima tahun kemudian dia dipanggil lagi ke isekai. untuk menghentikan amukan organisasi rahasia bernama \"Helheim\".\n\nNamun sebenarnya, organisasi itu adalah sejarah kelam chuunibyou yang dulu dia buat saat menyebut dirinya sebagai \"The Corpse King\"!?\n\nKenapa Helheim mengacau, dan siapa yang menyebarkan reputasi buruk? Sambil mengumpulkan kembali pengikut terkuat \"Hakkai\", Corpse King mulai bergerak lagi di isekai untuk membersihkan nama organisasi itu—sambil malu dengan sejarah chuunibyou-nya...\n\nPertama-tama, Kota Baja Gagiul. Após derrotar o Rei Demônio, foi forçado a retornar ao presente. Três anos depois, é invocado novamente para o mesmo mundo, desta vez para conter a fúria da sociedade secreta “Helheim”.\n\nSupostamente, essa organização seria, na verdade, a mesma que ele fundou durante sua fase de chuunibyou, quando se autodenominava “Corpse King” — um passado sombrio e embaraçoso demais para lembrar!\n\nAgora, alguém está se passando por “Helheim” e manchando seu nome. Enquanto relembra seu passado obscuro, ele retorna à ação naquele outro mundo.\n\nA primeira parada é a Cidade de Aço de Gagiul — onde precisa resgatar uma população assolada pela fome e a filha pálida do conde, que está em apuros.\n\n“Helheim, partindo.”"},"links":{"al":"187863","amz":"https://www.amazon.co.jp/dp/B0FH17LPDF","ap":"shikabane-ou-no-kikan","bw":"series/537048/list","ebj":"https://ebookjapan.yahoo.co.jp/books/911540","kt":"74555","mal":"179652","mu":"ind91y4","nu":"the-return-of-the-corpse-king-i-the-former-hero-summoned-once-again-to-another-world-to-stop-the-chuunibyou-secret-society-i-formed","raw":"https://comic-walker.com/detail/KC_006398_S"},"originalLanguage":"ja","publicationDemographic":"shounen","contentRating":"safe","tags":[{"id":"36fd93ea-e8b8-445e-b836-358f02b3d33d","name":{"en":"Monsters"}},{"id":"391b0423-d847-456f-aff0-8b0cfc03066b","name":{"en":"Action"}},{"id":"39730448-9a5f-48a2-85b0-a70db87b1233","name":{"en":"Demons"}},{"id":"4d32cc48-9f00-4cca-9b5a-a839f0764984","name":{"en":"Comedy"}},{"id":"87cc87cd-a395-47af-b27a-93258283bbc6","name":{"en":"Adventure"}},{"id":"a1f53773-c69a-4ce5-8cab-fffcd90b1565","name":{"en":"Magic"}},{"id":"aafb99c1-7f60-43fa-b75f-fc9502ce29c7","name":{"en":"Harem"}},{"id":"ace04997-f6bd-436e-b261-779182193d3d","name":{"en":"Isekai"}},{"id":"cdc58593-87dd-415e-bbc0-2ec27bf404cc","name":{"en":"Fantasy"}},{"id":"f4122d1c-3b44-44d0-9936-ff7502c39ad3","name":{"en":"Adaptation"}}]}

fca1e751-a233-426e-b897-443e4ada499e:::||@!@||:::2025-03-31T01:55:40:::||@!@||:::{"id":"fca1e751-a233-426e-b897-443e4ada499e","title":{"en":"Goddess' Target"},"altTitles":[{"ja":"女神の標的"},{"ja-ro":"Megami no Hyouteki"}],"description":{"en":"Eight years after the end of World War II, Haruko, an actress active in popular theater, is suddenly confronted by a group of strange men. They urge her, claiming that she holds a clue to what they're searching for, but Haruko has no recollection of the matter. Furthermore, the men begin to tell her a story far beyond her imagination: her father, a soldier, was not killed in action, but was tortured to death in a conflict over hidden gold bars belonging to the Imperial Japanese Army. Haruko is shaken by this shocking story, but it marks the beginning of her battle against those operating behind the scenes in postwar Japan, lusting after the gold bars...! Will she survive the attack of the men who have set their sights on her? As the lady of the house, she brought wealth to the family by successfully managing the finances. However, the incapable husband Devon spends her hard-earned money on his ex-wife, who is pregnant with his child. Devon asks Annis for a divorce but forces her to stay on the estate and continue to manage family businesses. When Annis was broken by her husband's betrayal, she encounters Rowan, an old acquaintance and fellow knight who seems to have feelings for her that’s been kept hidden for a long time.","es":"Tuve un matrimonio concertado basado en el testamento de mi madre, pero pensé que estaba bien porque tenía un marido que era coherente conmigo. sin embargo… “Divorciémonos, Agnes”. Amachi Kai, the weakest conqueror with little magical power, is challenging the dungeon to earn money for the medical expenses of his sick sister, Nagi. However, Nagi's condition suddenly worsens. A time when the nation stood on the edge of hunger and hope, when even one bowl of pig slop stew made from army leftovers could mean survival. In this era of post-war poverty, a man named Jeon Jung-yoon was desperate to give his people a proper, dignified meal. Meanwhile, Kim Hang-pil, a fresh-faced recruit just discharged from KATUSA, joins Jeon’s dream—driven by the thought of someone he loves. That someone is Lee Young-hee, his unspoken love, now selling bowls of pig slop from a shantytown on the fringes of society. Amid hunger, heartbreak, and hardship, they work tirelessly to create something revolutionary: A warm, simple meal for the masses. A symbol of survival. A taste of comfort. The birth of ramen."},"links":{"al":"191489","mal":"180492","mu":"eu932zv","raw":"https://page.kakao.com/content/66346574"},"originalLanguage":"ko","contentRating":"safe","tags":[{"id":"33771934-028e-4cb3-8744-691e866a923e","name":{"en":"Historical"}},{"id":"3e2b8dae-350e-4ab8-a8ce-016e844b9f0d","name":{"en":"Long Strip"}},{"id":"b9af3a63-f058-46de-a9a0-e0c13906197a","name":{"en":"Drama"}},{"id":"e197df38-d0e7-43b5-9b09-2842d0c326dd","name":{"en":"Web Comic"}},{"id":"ea2bc92d-1c26-4930-9b7c-d5c0dc1b6869","name":{"en":"Cooking"}},{"id":"f5ba408b-0e7a-484d-8d49-4e9125ac96de","name":{"en":"Full Color"}}]}

c6f32e0a-7e38-40be-a73e-3849baaffe9d:::||@!@||:::2025-04-14T01:55:24:::||@!@||:::{"id":"c6f32e0a-7e38-40be-a73e-3849baaffe9d","title":{"en":"BAD END"},"altTitles":[{"ja-ro":"Horror Anthology Comic: BAD END"}],"lastChapter":"13","relatedIds":["0e5c1ea3-a38f-4c61-86e2-0459dc8f61a4","cdfb0fdc-61ce-4279-978e-da241a4845b7"],"description":{"en":"The second volume of the most terrifying collection of masterpiece horror manga not yet published in a book, is finally complete! Any hope of a happy ending is trashed and thrown down the drain! 13 masterpieces that were published in commercial magazines but were buried in an era when it was impossible to understand why they were not published in books...\n\nEnjoy the essence of horror manga by pro authors that are hard to find these days. Many works can only be read here. The original illustrations by Michiru Noroi and Junji Ito are impressive! Recommended for those who are experiencing horror manga for the first time and those who love horror manga. Horror manga is actually so interesting. Why not decorate your bookshelf with real fear?\n\nCover art: Noroi Michiru\nFrontispiece: Junji Ito\nTable of Contents: Kanafuro Taro\nBonus manga: Tatari Takayama\n\n1. d5fc7efb-2d28-490f-bb0e-2c8aefdd6b85:::||@!@||:::2025-04-14T01:55:26:::||@!@||:::{"id":"d5fc7efb-2d28-490f-bb0e-2c8aefdd6b85","title":{"en":"Fuku no Mahou wo Anata ni."},"altTitles":[{"ja":"服の魔法をあなたに。"},{"ja-ro":"Fuku no Maho o Anata ni."},{"en":"The Magic of Clothes for You"}],"description":{"en":"Tono Tsumugi, who worked as an apparel store clerk, was impressed by the way of thinking of Arima Yusuke, who was a lecturer at a training session, and decided to work under Arima as a \"personal stylist\" who would match customers' needs with clothes. However, the Arima who awaited Tsumugi was a completely different person from the one she met at training...!? Today, too, the store receives items that have “something to say” about them.\n\nWelcome to the slightly mysterious and heartwarming world of antiques.\n\n(Source: Young Ace Up, translated)","ja":"西荻窪にある骨董品店「九十九商店」。そこでは、かつて人に裏切られた経験から誰も信用できなくなった男・史と、謎の少年・ましろが暮らしている。\nましろの正体は文房具「水滴」の付喪神であり、彼の「骨董品の“記憶”を視る能力」で二人は来店する人々の悩みを解決するのだった――。\n今日も店には“曰く付き”の品が持ち込まれる。\n少し不思議で、心あたたまるアンティークの世界へようこそ。"},"links":{"al":"199092","amz":"https://www.amazon.co.jp/-/en/pikomaro-ebook/dp/B0FNBRBBPZ?dib=eyJ2IjoiMSJ9.uudeUlwzO0rgb_Hy-P3MWKuun8hprAexvZhXnCHPJqA.zk48gBkB3vaPAd-ue5U78Zy6qq2RFrSKODzMYvZFwuk\u0026dib_tag=se\u0026keywords=がらくたから\u0026qid=1756986573\u0026s=digital-text\u0026sr=1-1","bw":"decc7eab02-d08d-4bcc-879c-bf5fccbdc907/?adpcnt=7qM_SasK","ebj":"https://ebookjapan.yahoo.co.jp/search/?keyword=がらくたから\u0026useTitle=1\u0026dealerid=30064\u0026utm_source=asp\u0026utm_medium=vc\u0026utm_campaign=rate","mu":"cr7algd","raw":"https://web-ace.jp/youngaceup/contents/1000300/"},"originalLanguage":"ja","publicationDemographic":"seinen","contentRating":"safe","tags":[{"id":"b9af3a63-f058-46de-a9a0-e0c13906197a","name":{"en":"Drama"}},{"id":"e5301a23-ebd9-49dd-a0cb-2add944c7fe9","name":{"en":"Slice of Life"}},{"id":"eabc5b4c-6aff-42f3-b657-3e90cbd00b75","name":{"en":"Supernatural"}},{"id":"ee968100-4191-4968-93d3-f82d72be7e46","name":{"en":"Mystery"}}]}

77f75d7b-9d51-4751-af4e-43f86fde41ea:::||@!@||:::2025-04-28T08:38:34:::||@!@||:::{"id":"77f75d7b-9d51-4751-af4e-43f86fde41ea","title":{"en":"Wakeari Akuyaku Reijou-tachi ga Shiawase na Dekiai Seikatsu wo Tsukamu made Anthology Comic"},"altTitles":[{"ja":"訳アリ悪役令嬢たちが幸せな溺愛生活を掴むまで アンソロジーコミック"},{"ja-ro":"Wakeari Akuyaku Reijou-tachi ga Shiawase na Dekiai Seikatsu o Tsukamu made Anthology Comic"},{"en":"The Shadow Ladies' Journey to Happiness"}],"description":{"en":"Even noblewomen with a \"dark past\" deserve happiness!\n\nAn anthology manga featuring a collection of heartwarming stories about noble ladies who were unfairly branded as \"villainesses.\" Despite their harsh circumstances, each of them finds a path toward a life filled with love, warmth, and gentle indulgence.\n\n+++**Volume 1 Contents:**\n1. \"Koori no Shinigami Reijou wa, Atataka na Dekiai ni Tokasareru\" (氷の死神令嬢は、温かな溺愛に溶かされる; \"The Ice-Cold Noblewoman, Melted by Warm Love\"). Art by Kuromizu Kanata; Story by Amekawa Touko.\n2. \"Akuyaku Reijou ni Tensei shita no de, Saikyou Bishounen wo Sodate Agete Ikinobiyou to shitara Shuuchakusaremashita\" (悪役令嬢に転生したので、最強美少年を育て上げて生き延びようとしたら執着されました; \"I Reincarnated as a Villainess in a Fantasy Story, so I Decided to Raise the Most Beautiful and Powerful Boy to Survive… but He Ended up Obsessed With Me\"). Art by Makita Ron; Story by Kotoko.\n3. \"Watakushi, Akuyaku Reijou no Alexia de Gozaimasu\" (わたくし、悪役令嬢のアレクシアでございます; \"I Am Alexia, the Villainess\"). Art by Shinjou Hajime; Story by Miyano Miyako.\n4. \"Kaibutsu Reijou Remanuel no Junan\" (怪物令嬢レマニュエルの受難; \"The Tribulations of the Lady of Beasts, Remanuel\"). By Tomatomato Mato.\n5. \"Busaiku to Iware Konyaku Hakisareta no de, Bijin ni naru Meiku Gijutsu wo Shuutoku shimashita!\" (不細工と言われ婚約破棄されたので、美人になるメイク技術を習得しました！; \"They Told Me I Was Ugly… and My Fiancé Abandoned Me. So I Decided to Learn the Art of Makeup to Become Beautiful\"). By Amai Maki.\n+++\n+++**Volume 2 Contents:**\n1.  \"Tsunagi no Miko\" (つなぎの巫女; \"The Miko of Bonds\"). Art by Tanaka Tetete; Story by Agutogi Akumi\n2. \"Nureginu wo Kise Rareta no de, Tantei Reijou ni Nari Sono Giwaku wo Harashimasu!\" (濡れ衣を着せられたので、探偵令嬢になりその疑惑を晴らします！). By Nanamitoiro.\n3. \"Konyakusha ni Mawashigeri wo iretara Shuuchaku Sare mashite\" (婚約者に回し蹴りを入れたら執着されまして). Art by Uno Rikka; Story by Sayama Hibiki.\n4. \"Akuyaku Reijou no Oshikatsu~ Ouji ni Konyaku Haki Sareta Kedo Oshi ni Dekiai Sarete Shiawase desu~\" (悪役令嬢の推し活〜王子に婚約破棄されたけど推しに溺愛されて幸せです〜). By Morita Renji.\n+++\n+++**Volume 3 Contents:**\n1. \"Akuyaku Reijou no Omei wo Kiserare Shoukan ni Tobasare ta no de, Zense de Kyabajou da ta Chishiki wo Ikashite Nariagarimasu\" (悪役令嬢の汚名を着せられ娼館に飛ばされたので、前世でキャバ嬢だった知識を活かして成り上がります！). By Muranishi Tenga.\n2. \"Akuyaku Reijou toshite Kouya ni Tsuihou Sareta no de, Monster wo Ka te Takumashiku Kurashimasu\" (悪役令嬢として荒野に追放されたので、モンスターを狩ってたくましく暮らします！). By Kajimiya Sai\n3. \"Raigetsu ni Konyaku Haki Sareru Reijou wa, Mottainai no de Hametsu Maeni Sanzai itashimasu\" (来月に婚約破棄される令嬢は、もったいないので破滅前に散財いたします). Art by Shibisaski Maru; Story by Yuzuhara Teiru.\n4. \"Time Leap shita ore ga Omoidashita no wa Konyaku Haki Zenya da ta.\" (タイムリープした俺が思い出したのは婚約破棄前夜だった。). Art by Rakuyou; Story by Amagasa Suiton\n+++","ja":"訳アリ令嬢でも、幸せになります！様々な事情で悪役令嬢の誹りを受けた令嬢が溺愛生活を送るまでを描くコミックアンソロジー！！\n\nVol 1\n漫画：黒水かなた 原作：雨川透子『氷の死神令嬢は、温かな溺愛に溶かされる』\n漫画：牧田ロン 原作：琴子『悪役令嬢に転生したので、最強美少年を育て上げて生き延びようとしたら執着されました』\n漫画：新城一 原作：宮之みやこ『わたくし、悪役令嬢のアレクシアでございます』\n漫画：十的々マト『怪物令嬢レマニュエルの受難』\n漫画：海人井槙『不細工と言われ婚約破棄されたので、美人になるメイク技術を習得しました！』\n\nVol 2\n漫画：田中ててて 原作：顎木あくみ『つなぎの巫女』\n漫画：七海といろ『濡れ衣を着せられたので、探偵令嬢になりその疑惑を晴らします！』\n漫画：宇野リッカ 原作：狭山ひびき『婚約者に回し蹴りを入れたら執着されまして』\n漫画：森田蓮次『悪役令嬢の推し活〜王子に婚約破棄されたけど推しに溺愛されて幸せです〜』\n\nVol 3\n漫画：村西てんが『悪役令嬢の汚名を着せられ娼館に飛ばされたので、前世でキャバ嬢だった知識を活かして成り上がります！』\n漫画：梶宮サイ『悪役令嬢として荒野に追放されたので、モンスターを狩ってたくましく暮らします！』\n漫画：柴咲まる 原作：柚原テイル『来月に婚約破棄される令嬢は、もったいないので破滅前に散財いたします』\n漫画：落葉 原作：天笠すいとん『タイムループした俺が思い出したのは婚約破棄前夜だった。』"},"links":{"amz":"https://www.amazon.co.jp/dp/B0DN2X2CWK","ap":"wakeari-akuyaku-reijou-tachi-ga-shiawase-na-dekiai-seikatsu-wo-tsukamu-made-anthology-comic","bw":"series/468164","ebj":"https://ebookjapan.yahoo.co.jp/books/826868/","mal":"181371","mu":"v41pom9","raw":"https://magcomi.com/episode/2550689798323953369"},"originalLanguage":"ja","publicationDemographic":"shoujo","contentRating":"safe","tags":[{"id":"423e2eae-a7a2-4a8b-ac03-a8351462d71d","name":{"en":"Romance"}},{"id":"51d83883-4103-437c-b4b1-731cb73d786c","name":{"en":"Anthology"}},{"id":"a1f53773-c69a-4ce5-8cab-fffcd90b1565","name":{"en":"Magic"}},{"id":"cdc58593-87dd-415e-bbc0-2ec27bf404cc","name":{"en":"Fantasy"}},{"id":"d14322ac-4d6f-4e9b-afd9-629d5f4d8a41","name":{"en":"Villainess"}}]}

Nate, with his sharp intellect, mastery in both academics and martial arts, and foreign-style beauty, is flawless in every way. He is well-known as \"the ideal of every woman in the world,\" but his true identity is that of a \"non-human being\" with black wings. Even as she grows older, Yuffie’s attempts at finding a partner continue to fail due to Nate’s overprotective tendencies. Determined to have a \"fateful encounter\" and escape Nate’s overbearing love, she sets out on her quest...!? The ultimate knight x a young noblewoman struggling with marriage, in this heartwarming, over-the-top love comedy!","ja":"伯爵令嬢のユフィには血の繋がらない「兄」がいる。頭脳明晰で文武両道、そして異国風の美貌で非の打ちどころのないネイト。「世の女性の理想の集大成」と名高い彼だが、その正体は黒い翼を持つ《人ならざるもの》。幼いユフィを人攫いから救い、なぜかそのままユフィの「兄」の座に収まっていたのだ。狙いが分からず警戒するユフィだが、ネイトの怒涛の溺愛っぷりにドキドキしてしまって…!? 年頃になっても彼の過保護ムーブのせいでユフィの婚活は今のところ惨敗続き。絶対運命の出会いをして脱・ネイトしたい！と息巻くが――!? 最強騎士×崖っぷち婚活令嬢の溺愛ラブコメ開幕！"},"links":{"mu":"oqho8or","raw":"https://www.cmoa.jp/title/301363/"},"originalLanguage":"ja","publicationDemographic":"josei","contentRating":"safe","tags":[{"id":"39730448-9a5f-48a2-85b0-a70db87b1233","name":{"en":"Demons"}},{"id":"423e2eae-a7a2-4a8b-ac03-a8351462d71d","name":{"en":"Romance"}},{"id":"cdc58593-87dd-415e-bbc0-2ec27bf404cc","name":{"en":"Fantasy"}},{"id":"f4122d1c-3b44-44d0-9936-ff7502c39ad3","name":{"en":"Adaptation"}}]}

6ecc4319-6326-4a90-b855-701941645813:::||@!@||:::2025-04-28T08:38:34:::||@!@||:::{"id":"6ecc4319-6326-4a90-b855-701941645813","title":{"en":"For the Young Villain's Happy Ending"},"altTitles":[{"ko":"어린 악당의 해피엔딩을 위하여"},{"ko-ro":"Eorin Akdangui Happy Ending-eul Wihayeo"},{"en":"For the Happy Ending of the Young Villain"},{"en":"To Ensure a Happy Ending for the Young Villain"},{"zh":"为了小反派的幸福结局"},{"id":"Untuk Akhir yang Bahagia bagi Penjahat Muda"}],"description":{"en":"I was reborn 14 years before the original novel began—as the empire’s strongest archmage.\n\nAll I remember is a single plea: “Protect them.” So I stayed low, planning not to interfere with the story’s happy ending.\n\nBut then I met the young Fourth Prince, the future tyrant shaped by tragedy. Gaunt and neglected, the child had never even tasted warm soup.\n\nI couldn’t just watch.\n\n“Your Highness, would you like to become my disciple?”\n\nTwelve years later, the once-abused prince is a grown man—still my loyal student, and now hiding bold feelings for his master.","id":"Seorang archmage bereinkarnasi 14 tahun sebelum dimulainya cerita asli dan memutuskan untuk diam di wilayah kekaisaran. Di istana, ia bertemu Pangeran Sa—penjahat utama yang kelak menjadi tiran karena masa kecilnya yang penuh penganiayaan. Tersentuh oleh penderitaan sang pangeran kecil, sang penyihir menawarkan untuk menjadikannya murid. Ia bertekad memberi akhir yang bahagia juga bagi penjahat muda itu. Dua belas tahun kemudian, Pangeran Sa tumbuh menjadi pria dewasa dan murid setia sang penyihir, menyimpan perasaan terlarang padanya. Kisah mereka penuh keajaiban, perlindungan, dan cinta yang berkembang perlahan.\n\n---\nAku bereinkarnasi ke dalam cerita, 14 tahun sebelum kisah aslinya dimulai. Sebagai penyihir agung terkuat di seluruh kekaisaran. […tolong lindungi dia.] Kalimat itu saja yang kuingat. Apakah maksudnya agar aku menjaga akhir dari cerita ini, karena novel ini berhenti di tengah jalan? Ini novel romansa, pada akhirnya pemeran utamanya pasti berakhir bahagia, kan? Masih lama sebelum cerita dimulai, jadi aku akan tinggal diam di wilayahku. Tapi kemudian aku bertemu dengannya di istana kekaisaran. Sang tokoh antagonis utama dalam cerita, Pangeran Keempat yang kelak menjadi tiran karena masa kecilnya yang penuh penderitaan. Tubuh kurus kering seperti binatang, dengan tulang-tulang menonjol. Memang menyedihkan… tapi kalau aku mengubah alur ceritanya, informasi yang kuketahui bisa menjadi tidak berguna. [Anak itu bahkan belum pernah mencicipi sup hangat.] Kalau cuma memberinya makan… seharusnya tak masalah, kan? Namun— “Yang Mulia Pangeran Keempat, rasanya enak bisa bersih-bersih, bukan?” “……” [Baginya, kekerasan dan pengabaian adalah hal yang biasa.] Saat aku melihatnya menggigil diam seolah sudah terbiasa disiram air dingin tengah malam oleh pelayan… Aku memutuskan. “Yang Mulia… bersediakah menjadi muridku?” Aku akan memberimu akhir yang bahagia juga. “Yang Mulia, kalau terus menatap seperti tadi, nanti ketahuan, lho? Oleh beliau yang bertindak seperti walimu itu.” “Bagus kalau begitu, Tuan Markis.” Dua belas tahun telah berlalu, dan kini Pangeran Keempat yang telah dewasa tetap menjadi murid penyihir agung. “Tolong, semoga beliau menyadarinya… perasaan tak pantas yang kusimpan untuknya.” \"Baiklah, aku akan menjaga agar cerita tetap sesuai naskah. Tapi, yang bahagia bukan hanya dua tokoh utama!\" Penyihir overpower Reina dan murid-murid tercintanya datang menyapa kalian!","ko":"원작이 시작되기 14년 전으로 빙의해버렸다.\n제국 내 가장 강하다는 대마법사로.\n\n[…를 지켜줘.]\n\n기억나는 건 이 말 하나.\n연재 중지된 소설 속이니 결말을 지켜달라는 건가?\n로맨스 소설. 어차피 결말은 주인공들의 해피엔딩이겠지.\n원작이 시작되려면 아직 멀었으니까 영지에서 조용히 있자.\n\n그러다 황궁에서 마주쳐버렸다.\n소설 속 메인 악당, 어린 시절의 불행 서사로 폭군이 되어버리는 사 황자와.\n짐승 같은 몰골. 뼈마디가 드러난 앙상한 몸.\n안쓰럽지만 등장인물의 서사를 바꾸면 내가 아는 정보와 달라질 수 있으니-.\n\n[아이는 따뜻한 수프를 먹어 본 적이 없었다.]\n\n밥 먹이는 것 정도는 괜찮겠지……?\n\n\n그러나.\n\n“사 황자 전하, 깨끗해져서 좋으시죠?”\n“…….”\n\n[아이에게 학대와 방치는 일상이었다.]\n\n한밤중, 찬물을 끼얹는 시종이 익숙하다는 듯 조용히 벌벌 떠는 아이를 본 순간 결심했다.\n\n“황자님. 제 제자가 되시겠습니까?”\n\n너도 해피엔딩을 맞게 해줄게.\n\n= = =\n\n“전하, 아까처럼 보고 계시면 들킵니다? 보호자 노릇을 하시는 그분께요.”\n“잘됐네요. 후작.”\n\n12년이 흘러, 성인이 된 사 황자는 여전히 대마법사의 제자로 남아있었다.\n\n“제발, 들켜줬으면 하거든요.”\n\n스승에게 품은 발칙한 자신의 마음을 알아차린 채."},"links":{"al":"190778","ap":"for-the-young-villains-happy-ending","mu":"l6khdyl","nu":"for-the-young-villains-happy-ending","raw":"https://page.kakao.com/content/66498857"},"originalLanguage":"ko","contentRating":"safe","tags":[{"id":"0bc90acb-ccc1-44ca-a34a-b9f3a73259d0","name":{"en":"Reincarnation"}},{"id":"3e2b8dae-350e-4ab8-a8ce-016e844b9f0d","name":{"en":"Long Strip"}},{"id":"423e2eae-a7a2-4a8b-ac03-a8351462d71d","name":{"en":"Romance"}},{"id":"a1f53773-c69a-4ce5-8cab-fffcd90b1565","name":{"en":"Magic"}},{"id":"ace04997-f6bd-436e-b261-779182193d3d","name":{"en":"Isekai"}},{"id":"cdc58593-87dd-415e-bbc0-2ec27bf404cc","name":{"en":"Fantasy"}},{"id":"f4122d1c-3b44-44d0-9936-ff7502c39ad3","name":{"en":"Adaptation"}},{"id":"f5ba408b-0e7a-484d-8d49-4e9125ac96de","name":{"en":"Full Color"}}]}
